name: army base
description: A base for the army to store and maintain their equipment and personnel. It uses a variety railways and roads to travel.

name: infrastructure
description: Infrastructure is used to move troops and equipment. It uses a variety of railways and roads to travel.

name: power plant
description: Power plant is used to provide electricity to the army base and infrastructure. It uses a variety of railways and roads to travel.

name: network
description: Network is used to the armed forces to communicate and share information.

name: data center
description: Data center is used to store and process data for the armed forces.

name: server
description: Server is used to store and process data for the armed forces.

name: port
description: Port is used to move troops and equipment. It uses a variety of ships and boats to travel.

name: shipyard
description: Shipyard is used to build and maintain ships and boats.

name: lighthouse
description: Lighthouse is used to guide ships and boats.

name: drone
description: Drone is used to gather information and attack enemy targets.

name: airport
description: Airport is used to move troops and equipment. It uses a variety of airplanes and helicopters to travel.

name: airbase
description: Airbase is used to store and maintain airplanes and helicopters.

name: radar
description: Radar is used to detect and track airplanes and helicopters.

name: artillery
description: Artillery is used to attack enemy targets.

name: ministry of economics
description: Ministry of economics is used to manage the economy of the country.

name: banking system
description: Banking system is used to manage the economy of the country.

name: firewall
description: Firewall is used to protect the country from cyber attacks.
